Love Story actors return to Harvard

Actors Ali MacGraw and Ryan O’Neal are returning to Harvard University more than 45 years after the release of their 1970 classic Love Story .

The duo, now in their 70s, will reflect on their careers in a conversation moderated by arts journalist Alicia Anstead.

MacGraw and O’Neal currently are co-starring in a national tour of Love Letters , which is about a man and a woman who maintain contact over 50 years through notes, cards and letters.

The play begins a one-week engagement at Boston’s Citi Shubert Theatre on Tuesday.

The actors are expected to drive to Harvard in an antique MG convertible similar to the one featured in Love Story . The film was about a wealthy Harvard student who marries a less wealthy student resisting his parents’ objections. — AP
title: 'Love Story' actors return to Harvard 45 years later
